### DisplayText {#a1bf47a02f06e5046c1061e4ada6ba0c4}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="std::string llvm::LineEditor::Completion::DisplayText">
A description of this completion.

This may be the completion itself, or maybe a summary of its type or arguments.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/lineeditor/lineeditor-h/#l00078">78</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/lineeditor/lineeditor-h">LineEditor.h</a>.

### TypedText {#a3c239d3902f72d63849233982175381b}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="std::string llvm::LineEditor::Completion::TypedText">
The text to insert.

If the user has already input some of the completion, this should only include the rest of the text.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/lineeditor/lineeditor-h/#l00074">74</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/lineeditor/lineeditor-h">LineEditor.h</a>.
